001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.exceptions;
002
003/**
004 * Exception thrown when UI authentication fails.
005 *
006 * <p>This exception indicates that an error occurred while attempting to authenticate
007 * via the UI, such as missing credentials or an unexpected login failure.
008 *
009 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
010 */
011public class AuthenticationUiException extends RuntimeException {
012
013   /**
014    * Constructs a new {@code AuthenticationUiException} with the specified detail message and cause.
015    *
016    * <p>The message provides details about the authentication failure, and the cause allows
017    * inspection of the underlying exception that triggered this error.
018    *
019    * @param message the detail message
020    * @param cause   the root cause of the authentication failure
021    */
022   public AuthenticationUiException(String message, Throwable cause) {
023      super(message, cause);
024   }
025
026   /**
027    * Constructs a new {@code AuthenticationUiException} with a default message and the specified cause.
028    *
029    * <p>Use this constructor when no custom message is needed; a standard message will be used instead.
030    *
031    * @param cause the root cause of the authentication failure
032    */
033   public AuthenticationUiException(Throwable cause) {
034      super("Failed to authenticate via UI", cause);
035   }
036}
